htmlEmbed:
Verified | COVID-19 Vaccines3/9/2022

The COVID-19 vaccines are our best hope to end the pandemic. Scientists, researchers and volunteers worked together across borders to create them and save lives. Learn more about how they work and what you need to know.

ArchivedRead

Verified is an initiative of the United Nations, in collaboration with Purpose, to cut through the noise to deliver life-saving information on COVID-19.

SHARE

Sign up to become an information volunteer and receive life-saving information to share with your networks.

Inscrivez-vous pour soutenir la diffusion de l'information et ainsi recevoir des informations essentielles à partager avec vos réseaux.

Regístrese para convertirse en voluntaria o voluntario de la información y recibir información de emergencia para compartir con sus contactos.

Зарегистрируйтесь, чтобы стать информационным волонтером, получать жизненно важную информацию и делиться ей с окружающими.

Inscreva-se para se tornar um voluntário ou uma voluntária da informação e receber informações salva-vidas que poderá compartilhar com a sua rede.

Melden Sie sich an, um Informations-Freiwilliger und erhalten Sie lebensrettende Informationen, die Sie mit anderen teilen können.

قاشترك للحصول على المعلومات الوقائية وشاركها مع مجتمعك.

जानकारी स्वयंसेवक बनने के लिए साइन अप करें और अपने नेटवर्क के साथ साझा करने के लिए जीवन रक्षक जानकारी को हासिल करें।

请注册成为信息志愿者，获取拯救生命的信息并分享给您的人际网络。

Jisajili ili uwe mwanahabari wa kujitolea na upokee habari zinazookoa maisha ili kushiriki na mitandao yako.

By signing up to receive our updates, you agree to Verified's Privacy policy and Terms of Use.
En vous inscrivant pour recevoir notre newsletter, vous acceptez la politique de confidentialité et les conditions d'utilisation de Verified.
Al registrarse para recibir nuestras notas informativas, usted acepta la política de privacidad y de uso de Verified.
Подписываясь на нашу рассылку, вы соглашаетесь с политикой конфиденциальности и условиями инициативы Verified
Ao se inscrever para receber nossa newsletter, você concorda com a Política de Privacidade e com os Termos de Uso do Verificado.
Wenn Sie sich für den Erhalt unseres Briefings anmelden, erklären Sie sich mit den Provacy-Richtlinien und Nutzungsbedingungen von Verified einverstanden.
عند التسجيل لتلقي ملخصنا، فإنك توافق على سياسة الخصوصية لمنظمة Verified وشروط الاستخدام
हमारे अपडेट प्राप्त करने के लिए साइन अप कर के, आप वेरिफ़ाएड की प्राइवसी नीति और उपयोग की शर्तों से सहमत होते हैं।
注册同意接收我们的简报，即表明你同意“联合国认证信息”的隐私权政策和使用条款。
Kwa kujisajili ili kupokea maelezo yetu mafupi, unakubaliana na Sera ya Faragha ya shirika la Verified na Masharti ya Matumizi.

COVID-19 Vaccines

The COVID-19 vaccines are our best hope to end the pandemic. Scientists, researchers and volunteers worked together across borders to create them and save lives. Learn more about how they work and what you need to know.

How we know the vaccines are saving lives

How we know the vaccines are saving lives We looked at the UK’s COVID deaths before and after the country’s vaccine rollout programme The COVID-19 vaccines are saving lives. How do we know? We looked at the UK, one of the countries privileged enough to have successfully vaccinated most of its adult population. We compared the number

COVID-19 Vaccines

The death rate has accelerated during the pandemic
COVID-19 Vaccines

Why should I take the COVID vaccine?
COVID-19 Vaccines

Vaccines work. But how?
COVID-19 Vaccines

How is a new vaccine developed?
COVID-19 Vaccines

Will COVID-19 vaccines protect us from new variants?
COVID-19 Vaccines

What’s the difference between the COVID vaccines?
COVID-19 Vaccines
